name: Paycheck: City RPG
description:
Paycheck is an open world roleplaying game set in modern times. Whether you want to hire some employees to help run your business or form a heist crew to rob businesses the choice is yours!

One of the biggest challenges in designing a game like this, is how do you ensure constructive gameplay? In other words, how do you prevent players from constantly shooting one another for no reason? Our solution to this and other gameplay related problems are the Fair Kill System and the Fair Arrest System. These intricate systems enable players to have fun in their respective roles without having to constantly deal with problematic players.

Features:
  • Fair Kill System to promote constructive gameplay among the various jobs
  • In-game currency can’t be bought with real money (to keep the in-game economy fair)
  • Fair Arrest System to keep players from being arrested without reason
  • Fun list of starting jobs with plenty more to be added in the future
  • Ability to own your own apartment or business
  • Sprawling city to explore with friends and enemies alike
  • Multiple playstyles available for each role
  • An array of starting weapons
  • Multiple vehicles on launch with many more to be added
  • Dedicated servers to encourage communal play
  • Complex VOIP system to allow local conversations and police chatter
  • Large player count per server
  • Shipment system to give store owners fun supply and demand style gameplay

Our goal is to craft the roleplaying game that you’ve always wanted but, never truly received!
